user_instruction: 'Send Mark an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position. You can check out my Notion for information. Mark'"'"'s email is mark.johnson@techcorp.com.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Candidate Updates for Engineering Team

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me an update on the current candidates for the open engineering team position? You can reference the latest details in your Notion workspace if that’s convenient. When you have a moment, please forward the summary to my email: mark.johnson@techcorp.com.

Thank you very much for keeping me in the loop!

Best regards,  
Mark

final_output:
